channel.title: Blitzscape is comming back and will be better then ever -RECRUITING-
channel.description:
Hello im josh and after lots of planing and hard thinking i decided that i am going to bring back blitzscape and to make it the best 317 private server out there i will be recruiting a team of people here is what we are looking for
317 Coder-open- 317 Coder-open- 317 Coder-open- 317 Coder-open-
co-owner-closed-
Moderator-CLOSED-jmood128 Moderator-open-
Website devloper-open-
Graphic designer-open-
Client manager-open-
these spots are opên post if you are intrested if you are post the following:
Name : Age : Ur e-mail/msn : What position u want : Why u want that postion : Ur Good at that postion because :

item.title: Blitzscape is comming back and will be better then ever -RECRUITING-
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

Name : Mark (Ingame: Da Mark)

Age : 14

Ur e-mail/msn : pkera@hotmail.com(Msn) (hardly on msn)

What position u want : Moderator, + Coder

Why u want that postion :
::Moderator::
I wanna be mod beacuse i follow the rules 99.99% all the time and ive been mod on some servers…

::Coder::
I wanna be a coder that codes most of the basics, (I dont wanna code servers so much)
I can add models to the client and make commands, etc (You deside, I can code hard stuff too)

Ur Good at that postion because : Im good at the mod spot beacuse ive been mod on 3 servers and i follow the rules 99.99% of the time. Im not that good at coding but, i just wanna help if you dont get enough people…

Thx, Pkera (Da Mark)

Read full topic

Ur Good at that postion because : I have a lot of experience in the position of a moderator. I don’t flame often. I always in-force the rules. and I am usually active.[/quote]

item.title: Blitzscape is comming back and will be better then ever -RECRUITING-
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:3, topic:338113”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=434510.msg3190453#msg3190453 date=1272203999]
Email: jmood123@gmail.com
Position: Moderator
Expirence: I was owner of 3 servers, co-owner or 2, mod on 1… Does that work.

Owner: Server-scape, cool-scape (This was only a development a year ago), Rune Topia.
Co-Owner: Xscape (I was co twice, he switched sources a few times…).
Mod: BoratScape (I was demoted because someone leaked crowns out.

Is that good or not…
[/quote]

Haha, you’re forgetting Close Encounters![/quote]

They never gave me mod, they said they would but I never got it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Name: John

Age: 16

Email: jmood123@gmail.com, jmood123@live.com

Position: Moderator

Why you want that position: because I don’t feel I deserve anything else with my experience.

Expirence: I was owner of 3 servers, co-owner or 2, mod on 1… Does that work.

Owner: Server-scape, cool-scape (This was only a development a year ago), Rune Topia.
Co-Owner: Xscape (I was co twice, he switched sources a few times…).
Mod: BoratScape (I was demoted because someone leaked crowns out.

Your good at this position: Yes I follow rules almost all the time, I don’t flame a lot do I?, I would also like to point out I have been a Co+ more then mod.

Is this good or not…
